attributes.action: Reverse the trend  of closing  special schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many children  with medical conditions or Syndromes, like Autism for example,  are "being thrown in at the deep end "  by having to go to mainstrem schools.   

I contend  that many of the special schools that have been closed over the past  twenty years should be re-opened.  It will lead to better outcomes for children with Special Educational Needs.
